channel.title: Mycraftuk build [iconomy][24/7 uptime][1.2.5][no whitelist]
channel.description: Welcome to MyCraftUK, The UK's Friendliest! About Mycraft Build! Mycraft Build is very unique giving all players an opportunity to show us there true talents. Our Builds server IP is: servers.mycraftuk.net:25565 so feel free to come on and start building with us! The Build server was launched on the 11/2/12 where we celebrated with an awesome Livestream event on our Twitch Tv!We have 4 Owners on the server: • Rob | sheffrob1998 • Dan | madogdan • Callum | savi555 • Mike | MrWindypops The server was originally founded and opened on the 25/9/11 and just a single year later they have a fully working Build and Survival server with thriving players that come back every day! You can come and join us on TS ( Teamspeak ) So now Heres the Server Stats! • 24/7 Playable server! We only ever go down for new Plugins, Lag Restarts and Minecraft Updates! • Always the Latest version of Bukkit! • Huge Shops where you can Buy Blocks and Items for building and Crafting! • Promotions are available! • There is an Admin or Moderator online 90% of the time! Meaning easy help when needed. • We use several amazing Plugins. Take iConomy for example, Its what lets you have money on our server! • Nether is enabled for you to build and live in! • 24/7 Teamspeak server for Build, Survival and general talk! So how does that sound? Did we mention that our servers are hosted by in our opinion The BEST server hosts around?! There cheap, reliable, great support and they even dedicate a whole Server towards each Minecraft Server you buy with them! Meaning there will Never be any lag whatsoever!

item.title: Mycraftuk build [iconomy][24/7 uptime][1.2.5][no whitelist]
item.dc:creator: @TheIrishPsycho TheIrishPsycho
item.description:
@TheIrishPsycho wrote:

Welcome to MyCraftUK, The UK’s Friendliest!
About Mycraft Build! Mycraft Build is very unique giving all players an opportunity to show us there true talents. Our Builds server IP is: servers.mycraftuk.net:25565 so feel free to come on and start building with us! The Build server was launched on the 11/2/12 where we celebrated with an awesome Livestream event on our Twitch Tv!We have 4 Owners on the server:
• Rob | sheffrob1998
• Dan | madogdan
• Callum | savi555
• Mike | MrWindypops
The server was originally founded and opened on the 25/9/11 and just a single year later they have a fully working Build and Survival server with thriving players that come back every day! You can come and join us on TS ( Teamspeak ) So now Heres the Server Stats!
• 24/7 Playable server! We only ever go down for new Plugins, Lag Restarts and Minecraft Updates!
• Always the Latest version of Bukkit!
• Huge Shops where you can Buy Blocks and Items for building and Crafting!
• Promotions are available!
• There is an Admin or Moderator online 90% of the time! Meaning easy help when needed.
• We use several amazing Plugins. Take iConomy for example, Its what lets you have money on our server!
• Nether is enabled for you to build and live in!
• 24/7 Teamspeak server for Build, Survival and general talk!
So how does that sound? Did we mention that our servers are hosted by in our opinion The BEST server hosts around?! There cheap, reliable, great support and they even dedicate a whole Server towards each Minecraft Server you buy with them! Meaning there will Never be any lag whatsoever!

Read full topic
